data.oai_dc:dc: NOAA Daily Surface Meteorologic Data at NCDC Miami International Airport Station (ID-085663), South Florida from January 1948 to February 2005
The National Climatic Data Center's (NOAA) daily mean, maximum, and minium air temperatures and daily precipitation collected at Miami International Airport Station (Coop ID- 085663).
